channel.name: Bloomberg TV US
channel.title: Rare WWII Gold Coin
channel.desc: RCTV is offering a 2020 Commemorative Gold Coin celebrating the 75th anniversary of the end of World War II. Struck from 1/2oz of pure .9999 gold and graded perfect PF70UCAM, this coin salutes the millions of Americans who bravely served during WWII.
